amendment.description: Amendment extends drug and alcohol testing to individuals performing maintenance work on U.S. air carriers at foreign aircraft repair stations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part C of House Report 110-335 to extend drug and alcohol testing to individuals performing maintenance work on U.S. air carriers at foreign aircraft repair stations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poe amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
